type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Lord Noble
rules_text:
Reach
[i]Methods[/i] [i]Course[/i] – Creatures you control have “Whenever a counter is put onto this creature, untap it. This ability triggers once each turn.”
[i]Deep Bonds[/i] – {2}, {T}: Support 2. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)[/i]
